facts: Contract specified Reading brand pipes for plumbing
Contractor installed Cohoes brand pipes of identical quality
Home was built exactly to specifications otherwise
Pipes would require demolition to replace
asp_facts: contract(c1). parties(c1, owner, contractor). subject_matter(c1, construction). breach(c1, yes). breach_material(c1, no). substantial_performance(c1, yes). deviation_type(c1, brand_substitution). quality_equivalent(c1, yes). willful_breach(c1, no). cost_to_remedy(c1, unreasonable). diminution_in_value(c1, minimal).
question: Can the contractor recover under the contract?
rationale: Under the doctrine of substantial performance, a party who has substantially performed may recover the contract price minus damages for any deficiency. The brand substitution with equivalent quality pipes is a minor deviation that does not constitute material breach.
